full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG GZHAN DON DON GNYER GYI 'GREL PA THEG CHEN RAB GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @149A *, ,CES THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG GZHAN DON DON GNYER GYI 'GREL PA THEG CHEN RAB GSAL 'DI, BTZUN PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS GDAN SA RIN CHEN SKAD DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
